headline.main: 2D FBI 'SPY' SET SNARES FOR NAZI; Another German-Born Agent of U.S. Is Government Witness at Espionage Trial

lead_paragraph: A second German-born, naturalized United States citizen who became a counter-espionage agent for the Federal Bureau of Investigation in order to trap members of an alleged Nazi spy ring took the witness stand yesterday at the trial of sixteen persons accused of espionage and failure to register as agents of a foreign government.
abstract: W Nipken, German-born naturalized U S citizen, testifies on counter-espionage and sale of bogus plane parts photographs to Reuper, former assoc employe of Air Associates Inc
